creator: opldupuy@gmail.com
text:
Does not seem to exist as an RFE 

Same request as in the Junit task [failureproperty The name of a property to 
set in the event of a failure (errors are considered failures as well).]

I ask for an optional "warningproperty" attribute.
If the javadoc generates at least one warning, the property is set.

This way by full build goes on, creates javadoc, raises a warning and sends an 
email if the javadoc has warnings the same way as it raises a warning and sends 
an email if the tests fail  .... but the build always goes on
*** Bug 35817 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: jglick@apache.org
jglick@apache.org
text:
See discussion in bug #35817 re. implementation. Seems to me this could be
implemented pretty easily by just grepping output for ": warning - ", at least
with the version of javadoc I use.
